reviewText: This was an eye opening documentary.  I never really knew all that much about Focus on the Family or Dr. Dobson.  I am amazed at just how much hate people preach all in the name of the Lord and Religion.  I am ready to join Soul Force!

This is a journey of people that may have been terrified but just say to the world this is who I am!
Stuff like this is just so epic to those that understand how hard it can be to just be.
Humanity has burnt witches, persecuted jews the list is endless of people that have lived with peace and love but been mutilated because they did not fit some powermonges goal of what it meant to be human.  People like this show us we are all earthlings.
EXCELLENT documentary! Mel White has an amazing background and has helped so many people with LGBT issues - especially good for parents and others dealing with Christianity and gay children.
